comments:
The test_importsExportsAddManyRemoveOneAtATime cross-reference adapter test fails when running the test in a workbench.  It does not fail when running headless.

The cause is a constraint installed in the org.eclipse.emf.validation.examples.ocl plug-in, which is violated by this test and rolls back the model change.  For some reason, this constraint does not kick in when running the tests headless.  This is a separate problem.

Test: test_importsExportsAddManyRemoveOneAtATime
Class: AllTests
Type: junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
Message: Failed to update model: "Book Root Book" must have an author.
